name: Kill The Boss
description:
Place your boss, mother-in-law or friend’s photo in to the rocket and invasion will begin.

Your purpose is to shoot as many rockets as you can. At the end of each level you’ll receive coins. With these coins you’ll be able to upgrade old guns or buy new ones.

- Rotate your device to control the guns.
- Upload photo from your image gallery or take picture with camera.
- Share your best score and rocket with placed photo with your facebook or twitter friends.

Hope you’ll enjoy our game. Your rates and comments will help us to improve it.

More Games: www.git-apps.com
